dtliExcerpt: Enjoy the buzz, because it wears off quickly. Once seated inside the similarly reconfigured theater space, the revival of John Kander and Fred Ebb’s classic musical “Cabaret, which opened Sunday night on Broadway, begins, and our response shifts a tad.
